title: Mon Post Show (3-22-21)
itunes:title: Mon Post Show (3-22-21)
description:
Raymundo tries out yet another new intro for the Post Show. Bobby says we should change the music to make it cheesier. Bobby on American giving up vacation days to see their team win a championship. A man got a tattoo of a QQ code for his Instagram…but it doesn’t work. Mike D on the Best Picture Nominees. Amy on how ordering drinks on flights has changed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
